explains: adj. 隐蔽的；隐退的，隐居的
v. 隔绝（seclude 的过去式）

sentences.en: We were tucked away in a secluded corner of the room.
sentences.cn: 我们被藏在那房间的一个隐蔽角落里。

sentences.en: Tiny secluded beaches can be found off the beaten track.
sentences.cn: 极小的与世隔绝的海滩能在鲜有人至之处找到。

sentences.en: He lives in a secluded five-bedroom luxury villa.
sentences.cn: 他住在一幢僻静的、有5间卧室的豪华别墅里。
